CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Harvest Cooperative relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative is {above} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Riverbend Plantation}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total water usage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VE.Q: What is Golden Harvest Cooperative's Water Usage in 2015?
VE.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's water usage in 2015 is {916796.42} cubic meters.

VE.Q: What is Riverbend Plantation's Water Usage in 2008?
VE.A: Riverbend Plantation's water usage in 2008 is {3795669.55} cubic meters.

VE.Q: What is Golden Harvest Cooperative's Water Usage in 2008?
VE.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's water usage in 2008 is {1342265.55} cubic meters.

VE.Q: What are the water usage of Golden Harvest Cooperative, Sunstone Farms, and Riverbend Plantation in 2012?
VE.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's water usage is {1074590.99} cubic meters, Sunstone Farms's water usage is {1105087.19} cubic meters, Riverbend Plantation's water usage is {4419239.59} cubic meters.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Water Usage in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum water usage is {856862.31} cubic meters.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Water Usage in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum water usage is {5051474.88} cubic meters.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Water Usage level recorded for Golden Harvest Cooperative?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative reached approximately {1981280.55} cubic meters in {1997}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Water Usage level recorded for Golden Harvest Cooperative?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's lowest recorded level is approximately {856862.31} cubic meters in {2016}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Water Usage?
SC.A: The average total water usage is {6374158.46} cubic meters.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage fall between 6061836.27 and 6699924.30 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {6206214.25} cubic meters in {2002}, {6692467.10} cubic meters in {2014}, {6521286.87} cubic meters in {2008}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage go below 6211005.02 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {6158291.13} cubic meters in {2003}, {6034806.19} cubic meters in {2000}, {6206214.25} cubic meters in {2002}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Water Usage exceed 6550755.55 cubic meters? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {6766674.89} cubic meters in {2013}, {6626313.05} cubic meters in {2015}, {6692467.10} cubic meters in {2014}.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 2003 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total water usage in 2003 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2014, did the total Water Usage experience a larger or smaller change than between 1999 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total water usage between 2003 and 2014 was {larger} than between 1999 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Water Usage in 1997 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total water usage in 1997 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2011, did the total Water Usage experience a larger or smaller change than between 2007 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total water usage between 1998 and 2011 was {larger} than between 2007 and 2010.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Riverbend Plantation} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Golden Harvest Cooperative, Sunstone Farms, Riverbend Plantation}.
